articles.title: Video: Trump talks about January 6 attack in never-before-seen footage - CNN Video
articles.description: In documentary footage from filmmaker Alex Holder, former President Donald Trump speaks about the January 6 attack on the Capitol and appears to downplay the actions of his followers.

articles.title: See Pence's reaction when he received a request to invoke 25th Amendment against Trump - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Dana Bash and Jake Tapper discuss the new clips showing Mike Pence receiving an email of the resolution from Congress demanding the invoke the 25th Amendment against President Trump.

articles.author: Kaitlan Collins, CNN
articles.title: Trump's allies were assured editorial input before filmmaker was subpoenaed
articles.description: Several of Donald Trump's closest allies sat for interviews during his final weeks in office with a British filmmaker after being assured they had editorial input over the final product, according to two people familiar with the situation.
